>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE =====<<


>>===== OPTIONS =====>>
{
  "require_explicit_legal_case_title_short": true
}
<<===== OPTIONS =====<<

>>===== RESULT =====>>
???
<<===== RESULT =====<<


>>===== CITATIONS =====>>
[
    [
        {
            "citationID": "CITATION-1", 
            "citationItems": [
                {
                    "id": "ITEM-1",
                    "locator": "103",
                    "label": "page"
                }
            ], 
            "properties": {
                "noteIndex": 1
            }
        }, 
        [], 
        []
    ],
    [
        {
            "citationID": "CITATION-2", 
            "citationItems": [
                {
                    "id": "ITEM-1",
                    "locator": "110",
                    "label": "page"
                }
            ], 
            "properties": {
                "noteIndex": 2
            }
        }, 
        [["CITATION-1",1]], 
        []
    ]
]
<<===== CITATIONS =====<<


>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <locale>
    <style-options jurisdiction-preference="babyblue"/>
  </locale>
  <macro name="juris-title">
    <text value="DUMMY-TITLE"/>
  </macro>
  <macro name="juris-title-short">
    <text value="DUMMY-TITLE-SHORT"/>
  </macro>
  <macro name="juris-main">
    <text value="DUMMY-MAIN"/>
  </macro>
  <macro name="juris-main-short">
    <text value="DUMMY-MAIN-SHORT"/>
  </macro>
  <macro name="juris-comma-locator">
    <text value="DUMMY-COMMA-LOCATOR"/>
  </macro>
    <macro name="juris-space-locator">
    <text value="DUMMY-SPACE-LOCATOR"/>
  </macro>
  <macro name="juris-locator">
    <text value="DUMMY-LOCATOR"/>
  </macro>
  <macro name="juris-tail">
    <text value="DUMMY-TAIL"/>
  </macro>
  <macro name="juris-tail-short">
    <text value="DUMMY-TAIL-SHORT"/>
  </macro>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <choose>
        <if position="first">
          <group delimiter=", ">
            <text macro="juris-title"/>
            <group delimiter=" ">
              <group delimiter=", ">
                <text macro="juris-main"/>
                <text macro="juris-comma-locator"/>
              </group>
              <text macro="juris-space-locator"/>
              <text macro="juris-tail"/>
            </group>
          </group>
        </if>
        <else-if position="subsequent">
          <group delimiter=", ">
            <text macro="juris-title-short"/>
            <group delimiter=" ">
              <group delimiter=", ">
                <text macro="juris-main-short"/>
                <text macro="juris-comma-locator"/>
              </group>
              <text macro="juris-space-locator"/>
              <text macro="juris-tail-short"/>
            </group>
          </group>
        </else-if>
      </choose>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "id": "ITEM-1", 
        "type": "legal_case",
        "title": "Smith v. Jones",
        "title-short": "Smith",
        "authority": "District Court",
        "volume": "200",
        "collection-number": "2000",
        "container-title": "F.",
        "page": "100",
        "jurisdiction": "us:c9:ca",
        "issued": {
          "date-parts": [
            [2000, 10, 1]
          ]
        }
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
